1.title: Pilot

episode of.title: The Beauty and the Beast Show (TV Series 2016– )

1.plot: Scott Casey Gale and GORGEOUS LINGERIE MODEL Sarah Russi, team up top give us all their latest views from politics, to Different Strokes, to Scott's love for Chill's ribs, plus more.

2.title: Practice Interview

episode of.title: The Beauty and the Beast Show (TV Series 2016– )

2.plot: Vince advises both Sarah and Scott that they need to get their numbers up if they want to remain on The BRAND Network. Vince attempts to sharpen their interviewing skills as he critiques the two co-hosts as they interview Jeff Lane.

3.title: Disco Fever

episode of.title: The Beauty and the Beast Show (TV Series 2016– )

3.plot: The Disco Inferno - Glenn Gilbertti - joins Sarah Russi, Scott Casey Gale, and host Vince Russo to discuss life in Las Vegas, Sarah's modeling career, his true feelings on the attractiveness of Scott, plus much more.

4.title: Sarah Is AWOL

episode of.title: The Beauty and the Beast Show (TV Series 2016– )

4.plot: Sarah is AWOL, but Scott Casey Gale is here in his St. Patrick's Day Regalia. What happened to Sarah---and will Scott cut a paper bag promo on her actions?

5.title: Bean Boozled

episode of.title: The Beauty and the Beast Show (TV Series 2016– )

5.plot: Sarah returns this week, as her and Vince have a differing of opinion on what this show is about. Also, Scott discusses eating Bean Boozled jellybeans, and the show gets crashed after Vince leaves the two hosts alone for five minutes.

6.title: No Show

episode of.title: The Beauty and the Beast Show (TV Series 2016– )

6.plot: Sarah Russi and Scott Casey Gale have to recover due to a no-show from a confirmed guest. Also, Sarah and Vince Russo disagree about Kanye West, Vince invites Scott to WrestleCon, and more.

7.title: Jonny Fairplay

episode of.title: The Beauty and the Beast Show (TV Series 2016– )

7.plot: Reality television's greatest heel Jonny Fairplay (Survivor) joins Sarah Russi, Scott Casey Gale, Vince Russo, and Jeff Lane on this week's show.

8.title: Celebrity Boxing

episode of.title: The Beauty and the Beast Show (TV Series 2016– )

8.plot: Celebrity Boxing promoter Damon Feldman joins the crew to discuss many aspects of his unique profession including his preferred type of celebrity, what the "16 minute man" entails, and what happened with the George Zimmerman/DMX fight.

9.title: Bill DeMott & the Quest for New Breasts

episode of.title: The Beauty and the Beast Show (TV Series 2016– )

9.plot: Sarah Russi and Scott Casey Gale are joined by WCW/WWE great Bill DeMott. Bill turns the tables and grills Sarah about her personal relationship and comes up with a plan for Scott to help her get breast implants.

10.title: Justin LaBar

episode of.title: The Beauty and the Beast Show (TV Series 2016– )

10.plot: Sarah Russi and Scott Casey Gale welcome Justin LaBar, writer from the Pittsburgh Tribune and creator of Chair Shot Reality. Enjoy Scott scratching himself like an ape and Sarah asking the same questions that Scott just asked.

11.title: How Big Is Your Wiener, Dylan?

episode of.title: The Beauty and the Beast Show (TV Series 2016– )

11.plot: Sarah and Scott welcome Dylan Bostic, the "Justin Bieber of professional wrestling". Dylan discusses the birth and evolution of his in-ring persona and reveals why he didn't get a job with TNA plus much more.

imdb.title: The Beauty and the Beast Show
akas: The Beauty and the Beast Show (United States)
plot: Vince Russo's The Brand favorites Scott Casey Gale and gorgeous lingerie model Sarah Russi team up to give us all their latest views of what's happening in the world.
